carton.name: Carton box
carton.desc:
We provide high-quality carton boxes in 3, 5, and 7-layers structures:
• 3-layers: A corrugated layer between two flat paper layers. Suitable for lightweight products such as food, clothing, electronics.
• 5-layers: Two corrugated layers and three flat paper layers. More durable, ideal for household goods and medium industrial items.
• 7-layers: Three corrugated layers and four flat paper layers. Strongest, use for heavy, bulky products and long-distance shipping.

✨ Features:
• A, B, C, E flute options – customized for stiffness.
• Kraft paper, recycled or premium art paper.

🛠️ Printing:
• Flexographic: Fast, water-based ink, ideal for simple designs.
• Offset with lamination: Sharp images, vibrant colors, great for branded packaging.

✂️ Die-cut boxes:
• Precise cutting with custom shapes (handles, locks, lids, etc.).

🎁 Applications:
• Gift boxes, premium food packaging, electronics.
🧵 Garment boxes with hangers: Keep clothes flat and wrinkle-free.
• Use in high-end fashion, suits, dresses, export uniforms.

cathouse.name: Premium Cardboard House for Pets
cathouse.desc:
🐾 Premium Cat House – Durable, Safe & Eco-Friendly 🐾

Looking for a warm and sturdy home for your furry boss? Discover our cat house made from 3, 5, and 7-layer carton – a perfect choice for both your pet and the planet!

📦 Superior Materials:
• 3-layer carton: Lightweight – Ideal for small or mobile cat houses.
• 5-layer carton: Strong – Perfect for medium-sized houses and active cats.
• 7-layer carton: Ultra-rigid – For larger cats or stable long-term setups.

💡 Smart & Stylish Design:
• Customizable with doors, air vents, handles, locking lids, etc.
• Eco-friendly materials: kraft, recycled, or premium art paper.

🎨 Outstanding Printing:
• Flexo: Logo, cat name, cute patterns – budget-friendly and green.
• Offset: Premium version – sharp images, vivid colors, for a standout pet space.

😻 Comes with a scratch pad – made from tightly layered 5-layer carton, giving your cat fun and comfort daily.

polybag.name: Poly Bag
polybag.desc:
We offer high-quality poly bags make from PE, PP, OPP, and multi-layer films:
• PE (Polyethylene): Soft, durable, moisture-resistant. Ideal for packaging food or moisture-sensitive products. 🍞
• PP (Polypropylene): Tougher than PE, heat-resistant. Perfect for fashion and accessories. 👗
• OPP (Oriented Polypropylene): Glossy and transparent. Use for premium products and sealed bags. 💎
• Multi-layer film: Combines different plastics to enhance durability and protection. 🔒
✨ Features:
• Moisture, dust, and light resistance. ☁️
• High strength, tear-resistant. 💪
• Recyclable and eco-friendly. 🌍
🛠️ Printing techniques:
• Gravure printing: High resolution, vibrant colors.
• Flexographic printing: Cost-effective for simple designs.
• Silk screen printing: Ideal for small, simple designs. 🖨️
✂️ Cutting styles:
• Straight cut, shoulder cut, box cut, handle cut. ✂️
🎁 Suitable for:
• Packaging food, fashion, accessories. 🎽

hangtag.name: Hangtag
hangtag.desc:
Hangtags are essential accessories to showcase brand identity and product information:
📄 Common paper types:
• Bristol: Smooth and stiff with sharp printing – great for clothing or accessory tags.
• Couche: Glossy or matte – vibrant images, ideal for kidswear or gifts.
• Ivory: Bright and sturdy – perfect for premium fashion or cosmetics.
• Kraft: Natural brown – eco-friendly look, great for handmade or minimalist brands.
• Art paper: Variety of colors and textures – ideal for creative and high-end tags. ✨
🎨 Printing techniques:
• Offset printing: Sharp results, suitable for complex designs.
• Screen printing: Simple prints, supports special inks (metallic, glow-in-the-dark). 🖨️
✂️ Finishing methods:
• Punching holes (round, square, custom) for strings/hooks.
• Custom die-cut shapes (circle, oval, logo-based).
• Lamination: Matte or gloss for durability.
• Foil stamping: Metallic highlights (gold, silver) for logos.
• Embossing/Debossing: Adds premium tactile effect. 💎
🎯 Applications:
• Suitable for fashion, gifting, handmade or high-end products. 🎁

carelabel.name: Care Label
carelabel.desc:
Care labels play a vital role in providing maintenance instructions and enhancing product professionalism:
🧵 Common materials:
• Satin ribbon: Smooth and glossy – ideal for luxury fashion and lingerie.
• Cotton fabric: Soft and breathable – great for kidswear and eco-friendly items.
• Polyester: Durable and heat-resistant – perfect for sportswear and frequent washing.
🎨 Colors:
• Basic colors: White, black, grey – ensures readability.
• Custom colors: Brand-matching for standout design.
• Safe, non-toxic dyeing – skin-friendly and colorfast. 🌿
🖨️ Printing techniques:
• Flexo printing: High volume with clear, durable prints.
• Screen printing: Simple prints with options for raised or glossy effects.
• Digital printing: Multicolor, sharp results – suits complex designs.
✂️ Cutting methods:
• Straight cut: Attached directly to the product.
• Center fold: Double-sided print – ideal for sewing into seams.
🎯 Advantages:
• Withstands frequent washing.
• Maintains clear info and reinforces brand value. 💎

sticker.name: Stickers
sticker.desc:
Stickers are a versatile and eye-catching solution for branding, typically applied directly to packaging or products:
🧾 Materials:
• Standard decal paper: Easy to use and cost-effective – ideal for simple labels.
• Kraft paper: Rustic and vintage – adds a handmade, eco feel.
• PVC/PP: Durable and waterproof – great for moist or outdoor environments.
• Transparent film: “Invisible” effect – perfect for clear packaging.
🎨 Printing techniques:
• Offset or digital printing – ensures sharp and accurate colors.
• UV printing – enhances durability and scratch resistance.
• Matte or glossy lamination – for a premium finish.
🖇️ Shapes:
• Die-cut (custom shape)
• Round, square, rectangular, or custom shapes.
🎯 Applications:
• Seal labels, brand tags, QR codes, warranty stickers.
• Widely used in fashion, food, cosmetics, and logistics. 🚛

wovenlabel.name: Woven Label
wovenlabel.desc:
Woven labels are a key branding element, typically sewn directly onto the product:
🧵 Main materials:
• Polyester: Common and durable – fray-resistant and long-lasting.
• Woven cotton: Soft, classic – offers a handmade, premium feel.
• Taffeta: Lightweight and thin – ideal for simple logos or texts.
🎨 Colors:
• Woven with colored threads – excellent colorfastness.
• Pantone color matching – consistent with brand identity.
• Up to 2–8 colors per design. 🌈
🎨 Styles and techniques:
• Plain background weaving: Highlights logo or text.
• Inverted background: Decorative base – adds creativity.
• Hot-cut or folded edges for easy sewing on collar, hem, or sleeve.
✂️ Label types:
• Center fold
• End fold
• Straight cut (tag style)
🎯 Advantages:
• High durability, unlike printed labels that may peel.
• Adds a touch of class and trust to the product. 💎

box.name: Paper Box
box.desc:
We offer premium boxes made from Duplex and Ivory paper, combined with advanced offset printing technology:
• Duplex paper: One side coated with a smooth, glossy finish, while the other side is typically gray. High rigidity and durability, ideal for larger boxes or products needing sturdy packaging. Commonly used for food packaging, industrial goods. 🍫
• Ivory paper: Both sides are smooth and bright white, giving a premium feel. Popular for cosmetics, gift boxes, and high-aesthetic products. 💎
✨ Offset printing technology:
• Crisp images, true-to-life colors.
• Cost-effective for large orders.
• Can be combined with finishing effects like matte/gloss lamination, foil stamping, embossing, or spot UV. 🖨️
✂️ Die-cutting process:
• Precise die-cutting to shape boxes as per the design.
• Can create features like lids, handles, or special frames. ✂️
🔨 Box assembly:
• Folded and glued securely by machine or by hand.
• Finishing options: Matte/gloss lamination, foil stamping, embossing, PVC window. 🎁
🎯 Suitable for:
• Cosmetic boxes, gift packaging, premium food packaging, and branded products. 🎉

accessories.name: Another products
accessories.desc:
Besides our main product lines, we offer a wide range of packaging accessories and materials:
🔫 Tag pins & tag guns: For attaching tags or labels to garments – durable and friendly usage.
🧵 Eyelets & hanging strings: Nylon or cotton strings – customizable with logo print, ideal for fashion or gifting.
📄 Desiccant paper & moisture bags: Moisture control to prevent mold – available with custom logo or branding.
🏠 Pet house box: Made from eco-friendly cardboard – easy to assemble and transport, perfect for pets.
We deliver a complete packaging solution from core products to accessories – ensuring product protection and brand recognition.
